body_html:
@peterjc123 I tried your recommendation, and it has solved the ATen.dll issue, as that now builds correctly, many thanks!

However, like everyone else, I am also getting the error that TH/TH.h cannot be found when trying to build libshm_windows.

The problem is, the build process does not appear to be copying over any of the key header files from pytorch/aten/src/*/*.h to pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include

I can see that the compiler is being passed the correct -I include directory:

ClCompile:
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\x86_amd64\CL.exe /c /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS /I/include/THCS /I/include/THPP /I/include/THNN /I/include/THCUNN /IC:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows /Z7 /nologo /W1 /WX- /O2 /Ob2 /D TH_INDEX_BASE=0 /D _WIN32 /D NOMINMAX /D NDEBUG /D _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE=1 /D SHM_EXPORTS /D "CMAKE_INTDIR=\"Release\"" /D shm_EXPORTS /D _WINDLL /D _MBCS /Gm- /EHa /MD /GS /fp:precise /Zc:wchar_t /Zc:forScope /Zc:inline /Fo"shm.dir\Release\\" /Fd"shm.dir\Release\vc140.pdb" /Gd /TP /errorReport:queue C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp
  core.cpp
C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp(5): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No such file or directory [C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\build\libshm_windows\shm.vcxproj]

However, whatever earlier upstream process is supposed to populate pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include with all of the ATen headers is not working correctly. Is this process part of CMake or a python script somewhere?
body_text:
@peterjc123 I tried your recommendation, and it has solved the ATen.dll issue, as that now builds correctly, many thanks!
However, like everyone else, I am also getting the error that TH/TH.h cannot be found when trying to build libshm_windows.
The problem is, the build process does not appear to be copying over any of the key header files from pytorch/aten/src/*/*.h to pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include
I can see that the compiler is being passed the correct -I include directory:
ClCompile:
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\x86_amd64\CL.exe /c /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS /I/include/THCS /I/include/THPP /I/include/THNN /I/include/THCUNN /IC:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows /Z7 /nologo /W1 /WX- /O2 /Ob2 /D TH_INDEX_BASE=0 /D _WIN32 /D NOMINMAX /D NDEBUG /D _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE=1 /D SHM_EXPORTS /D "CMAKE_INTDIR=\"Release\"" /D shm_EXPORTS /D _WINDLL /D _MBCS /Gm- /EHa /MD /GS /fp:precise /Zc:wchar_t /Zc:forScope /Zc:inline /Fo"shm.dir\Release\\" /Fd"shm.dir\Release\vc140.pdb" /Gd /TP /errorReport:queue C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp
  core.cpp
C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp(5): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No such file or directory [C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\build\libshm_windows\shm.vcxproj]

However, whatever earlier upstream process is supposed to populate pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include with all of the ATen headers is not working correctly. Is this process part of CMake or a python script somewhere?
body:
@peterjc123 I tried your recommendation, and it has solved the ATen.dll issue, as that now builds correctly, many thanks!

However, like everyone else, I am also getting the error that TH/TH.h cannot be found when trying to build libshm_windows.

The problem is, the build process does not appear to be copying over any of the key header files from `pytorch/aten/src/*/*.h` to `pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include`

I can see that the compiler is being passed the correct -I include directory:

```
ClCompile:
  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\bin\x86_amd64\CL.exe /c /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC /Ic:/Unix/compile/pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS /I/include/THCS /I/include/THPP /I/include/THNN /I/include/THCUNN /IC:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows /Z7 /nologo /W1 /WX- /O2 /Ob2 /D TH_INDEX_BASE=0 /D _WIN32 /D NOMINMAX /D NDEBUG /D _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE=1 /D SHM_EXPORTS /D "CMAKE_INTDIR=\"Release\"" /D shm_EXPORTS /D _WINDLL /D _MBCS /Gm- /EHa /MD /GS /fp:precise /Zc:wchar_t /Zc:forScope /Zc:inline /Fo"shm.dir\Release\\" /Fd"shm.dir\Release\vc140.pdb" /Gd /TP /errorReport:queue C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp
  core.cpp
C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\libshm_windows\core.cpp(5): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No such file or directory [C:\Unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\build\libshm_windows\shm.vcxproj]
```

However, whatever earlier upstream process is supposed to populate pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include with all of the ATen headers is not working correctly. Is this process part of CMake or a python script somewhere?
